subject: Pedals
description_text:
Hi, I just ordered the Simsonn Pro X Pedals with the Ultra Upgrade Kit.

I was wonderin, if the clutch is 2 way hydraulic damper or 1 way

In your YouTube video "Discover Whatâ€™s New in the Simsonn Plus X Pedal" you
used the 2 way hydraulic damper for the throttle.

But on the packing it says to use the 1 way hydraulic damper for the
throttle and the 2 way for the clutch.


Would love to get the clarification for this :)

Thank you in advance

Best regards

conversations.body_text: Hello, the hydraulic damping of the clutch is 2 way, and the throttle is 1 way .  Thank you for your correction, we will modify it as soon as possible.
